home.title: Welcome to Linux From Scratch!
home.p1: Currently, the Linux From Scratch organization consists of the following subprojects:
home.p2: LFS, BLFS, ALFS, CLFS, HLFS, Hints, LiveCD and Patches, you can visit

projects.header: Linux From Scratch (LFS) is a project that provides you with step-by-step instructions for building your own custom Linux system, entirely from source code. Currently, the Linux From Scratch organization consists of the following subprojects:
projects.LFS: Linux From Scratch is the main book, the base from which all other projects are derived.
projects.BLFS: Beyond Linux From Scratch helps you extend your finished LFS installation into a more customized and usable system.
projects.ALFS: Automated Linux From Scratch provides tools for automating and managing LFS and BLFS builds.
projects.CLFS: Cross Linux From Scratch provides the means to cross-compile an LFS system on many types of systems.
projects.HLFS: Hardened Linux From Scratch focuses on building an LFS system with heightened security.
projects.Hints: The Hints project is a collection of documents that explain how to enhance your LFS system in ways that are not included in the LFS or BLFS books.
projects.LiveCD: The LiveCD project provides a CD that is useful as an LFS build host or as a general rescue CD.
projects.Patches: The Patches project serves as a central repository for all patches useful to an LFS user.

home.p1: 目前，Linux From Scratch 由以下子项目组成：
home.p2: LFS，BLFS，ALFS，CLFS，HLFS，Hints，LiveCD 和 Patches，你可以浏览

projects.header: Linux From Scratch (LFS) 教你如何一步一步从源码建造自制的linux系统，目前Linux From Scratch由以下子项目组成：
projects.LFS: Linux From Scratch，这是最重要的，是其他项目的基础。
projects.BLFS: Beyond Linux From Scratch，帮助扩展你的linux系统， 使得功能更丰富，更好用。
projects.ALFS: Automated Linux From Scratch，提供一些工具自动管理LFS和BLFS。
projects.CLFS: Cross Linux From Scratch，为跨平台编译linux成为可能。
projects.HLFS: Hardened Linux From Scratch，专注打造安全可靠的系统。
projects.Hints: 提供文档扩展你的LFS系统，这些内容并不包含在LFS或者BLFS的资料中。
projects.LiveCD: 教你如何制作CD光盘，以备不时之需。
